裧字的基本解释

裧
chān
古同“幨”，车上的帷幕：“妇车亦如之，有裧。”
古同“襜”，围裙。
古代装饰柩车的裙缘。

裧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chān］
［《廣韻》處占切，平鹽，昌。］
［《廣韻》昌豔切，去豔，昌。］
(1)古代车上的帷幕。
(2)古代装饰柩车的裙状物。

裧字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裧； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1118第16
【唐韻】【集韻】?處占切，音襜。【禮·雜記】其輤有裧。【註】謂鼈甲邊緣。【儀禮·士昏禮】婦車亦如之，有裧。【註】裧，車裳帷，《周禮》謂之容車，與幨、襜同。互見巾部幨字、本部襜字註。　又【廣韻】昌豔切，音韂。披衣也。　又【集韻】吐敢切，音菼。【類篇】毳衣謂之裧。

裧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
裧字的起名意思

暂无。

裧
Basic explanation of words
裧
chān
Gu Tong "幨", the curtain on the car: "Women's car is like this, there is a chase."
Ancient Tong "Xiang", apron.
The skirt of the ancient decorative hearse.
裧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chān］
["Guangyun" Chu Zhanqi, Pingyan, Chang. ]
["Guang Yun" Chang Yan cut, go Yan, Chang. ]
(1) The curtain on the ancient car.
(2) The skirts of ancient decorative hearses.
裧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [The Department of Clothing Characters] 　裧; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1118 Page 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Everywhere is accounted for and cut, with sound. 【Rite·Miscellaneous】It's large and varied. [Note] The edge of the turtle shell. 【Rituals·Shiyunli】The same goes for women's cars, which have their own style. [Note] Zhe, Cheshangwei, "Rongche" in "Zhou Li" is the same as 幨 and 襜. See each other's turban sacred character and the note of the original 襜 character.　[Guangyun] Changyan cut, sound. Cloth is also.　[Jiyun] Spit and dare to cut, sound 菼. 【Classes】Willow clothes are called 裧.

chān
сущ.
1) * занавес, штора (экипажа)
妇车有裧 экипаж супруги снабжён занавесями
